subject: Baseball
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Mike Schmidt and Barry Larkin will be coaches on the United States team at the second World Baseball Classic. The pitching coach Marcel Lachemann and the hitting coach Reggie Smith were also chosen for Manager Davey Johnson’s staff, USA Baseball announced. Schmidt, Larkin and the former major league player Bill Ripken will serve as auxiliary coaches.
